title: #IstandwithAhmed breaks internet: Millions on clock watch for 9yo detained for device
content:
russia today - 9/16/2015 10:47:25 PM - GMT (+4 )    #IStandWithAhmed became the number one trending hashtag worldwide on Twitter after 14-year-old Ahmed Mohamed was handcuffed and arrested for taking a homemade clock to his Texas high school. 
Read Full Article at RT.com
